item.title: Origin Story: The Packard Bell That Started It All
item.description:
It all started in a dark alley.

It was 1992. I was 11. A shadowy figure leaned in and whispered,
‚ÄúHey kid‚Ä¶ this fell off the back of a truck. You interested in a state-of-the-art Packard Bell?‚Äù

No dummies. You didn‚Äôt really think that‚Äôs how this started, did you?

Gotcha.

Christmas, 1993 ‚Äî Berwyn, Illinois

The real beginning was Christmas morning, 1993 ‚Äî at my grandparents‚Äô apartment in Berwyn, Illinois.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
Hello, and welcome to my site.

My name is John Janes, and I‚Äôve been programming in one form or another for most of my life. This blog is a place to share my thoughts on technology and to document what I‚Äôve learned over a 25+ year professional career in software development.

Operating Systems

My daily driver is NixOS, though I regularly work on macOS and Windows as well.
On the server side, Ubuntu is usually my platform of choice.
